creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: wide flaring shoulder and wide mouth with a small foot; 2 pairs of decorative handles; green glaze; band of diamonds flanked by circles at shoulder
medium: High fired stoneware with impressed decor under a celadon glaze
text: Guan jars of similar shape, impressed decoration, and subtle pale green celadon glaze are generally associated with western Qin tombs. The best works are evenly potted, wheel thrown vessels with restricted decor, like the present jar.
title: Jar (kuan)
